InitMessage: There are {size} participant slots ready for sign-ups.
MainMenu:
Participant Menu
====================
1. Sign Up
2. Cancel Sign Up
3. View Participants
4. Save Changes
5. Exit
SignupSlotError:
Error:
Slot #{StartSlot} is filled. Please try again.
SignupSuccess:
Success:
{SignupName} is signed up in starting slot #{StartSlot}.
CancelError:
Error:
{CancelName} is not in that starting slot.
CancelSuccess:
Success:
{CancelName} has been cancelled from starting slot #{CancelSlot}.
ExitPrompt:
Any unsaved changes will be lost.
Are you sure you want to exit? [y/n]
